text: The Alpine Skiing Europa Cup is an international Alpine skiing circuit organized annually by the International Ski Federation (FIS) beginning with the 1971-1972 season. Although held in Europe, these races are also open to non-European skiers. ==Editions== All rankings and results. {| class="wikitable" width=100% style="font-size:90%; text-align:left;" ! rowspan="2"
